attributes.action: Encourage Theresa May to stay on as Prime Minister
attributes.background:
Characteristics of an excellent leader:
Honesty and Integrity
Passion
Commitment and passion for the country over personal agendas
Drive and determination
Care
Accountability
Empathy 
Mrs May appears to have all of the above, combined with a deep care about the future and success of the UK.

rejection.details: This would be a personal decision for the Prime Minister and not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
